name: Netmon (lowrezjam 2021)
description:
Initially submitted for LowRezJam 2021.

--The Game--

A girl's canine companion, a Netmon named Mongrowl, has gone and done it! He ran away again.  Explore this mini-world, encounter its mini-beasts, and pacify Mongrowl so he returns home.

Enjoy the original soundtrack and audio emissions, I had fun working with sound this time~

--The Team--

  • Code, Audio, Tilesets - ForteFortissimo
  • Monster Design + Art - Saxorus

--Controls--

Move: Arrow Keys

Interact/Confirm: C

Go back: X

Open Menu/Swap Party Order: Z

--Notes--

Sweets and Risk Coins have no functionality in the game as of the jam build. You can buy them if you want, but they don't do anything! Whoops!

Saving and loading are also disabled, sorry about that! Post-jam, perhaps?
